title: Request a Late Check-out
description: An in-house guest requests a late check-out for their room.

tasks.description: Identify the guest's current reservation by their room number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the guest's folio.

tasks.description: Check room availability and housekeeping schedules to see if a late check-out is possible.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that a 2 PM late check-out can be accommodated.

tasks.description: Update the reservation with the new departure time and inform the guest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the guest's booking and confirms the late check-out time.
